DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyse the anatomic influence of the ribs related to the incidence and severity of burst spine fractures.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of the Ribs on the Gravity of Burst Thoracic Spine Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: To analyse the anatomic influence of the ribs related to the incidence and severity of burst spine fractures, with the measurements of kyphosis, vertebral collapse and vertebral canal narrowing
DOC.criteria: burst fractures in thoracic spine fractures that were not burst fractures in thoracic spine
